__e: Like when Polly and Pete told us, I felt panicked for them before I remembered that people actually want to get pregnant now.
For the first time, somebody gets me, and I can be myself, Polly, and we talk, and not some bullshit small talk... real stuff!
Whatever Jason did to Polly, he's still a person.
Look, Polly, it was your idea to tag along, not mine.
How about Polly comes first on a day where we have nothing scheduled?
Now, what happened to Polly is not to your fault.
Oh, my... no, no, Polly, I don't want you to feel that way, all right?
Our doing this fakakta playdate here at the house 'cause either Natalie needs friends, or Polly never had friends.
